title: A Pastermiece.
review: Mitsuha destroyed the past and went to the big City. Because of someone who shares this history, she was able to go back and save what matters to her. The Village is not a place. As a millennial forum rat the title translates into 'you are name'. Since this happens continuously for all of the youth who flare into unruly comets the time is able to bend and it takes an elder to see how the events are unfolded and to have the patience of weaving and helping the youth to find themselves. 10/10IMDB. Bring back the comment section. 1/10
